entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TestOnlyProductBehavior infrastructure used in installer tests patches codesigned binaries on macos resulting in test failuress. #91486
  • FileStream opened with FileOptions.DeleteOnClose does not work with FileShare.Read #91484
  • [API Proposal]: Initial capacity attribute for IEnumerable deserialization #91467
  • [API Proposal]: IKeyedServiceProvider Have a method to get all keys for a ServiceType, an option to make the keys services unique and the option to getservices return all keyed services #91466
  • Got Win32Exception when I send an HTTPS request #91464
  • [API Proposal]: Expose negotiated cipher suite and TLS protocols via HttpResponseMessage #91460
  • [Mono] Add basic SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector3 on Arm64 #91456
    9.0.0
  • There's gotta be a way for array to be able to store an unlimited amount of data with one final exception that say it can not, so https://source.dot.net/#System.Private.CoreLib/src/libraries/System.Private.CoreLib/src/System/Convert.cs,e54b8e5a7f9d845a doesn't have to throw an exception here for example #91450
  • Visual Studio 2022 Community Shell Function runtime error #91449
  • [net7.0][mono][iOS] AOT fails for CommunityToolkit.WinUI.UI.dll #91444
  • Assertion failed 'store->TypeGet() == src->TypeGet()' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #91443
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Blittability check doesn't account for generic structs #90828
    9.0.0
  • ILLinker should special case facade assemblies #90469
    Future
  • [wasm] Perf pipeline broken with switch to net9.0 #91442
    9.0.0
  • Options generator perf improvements #91073
    8.0.0
  • Options source generator shouldn't use random names #90990
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Reflection documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88571
    8.0.0
  • Possible Issue With Dependency Injection Container Service Resolution #91366
  • Can't build runtime with recent SDK due to `IsTrimmable` errors #91010
  • Item4 is missing in some `ValueTuple`s' `IStructuralEquatable.Equals` #91457
    8.0.0
  • Webassembly size and performance #91437
  • [browser][wasm] Request Streaming upload via http handler #36634
    9.0.0
  • TaskAsyncEnumerableExtensions.WithCancellation does not override a cancelled token with an active one. #91397
  • [browser] Migrate `WebAssemblyHttpRequestMessageExtensions` to runtime #91453
    9.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Optimize OP_R8CONST and OP_R4CONST on arm64 #83717
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose `FileStream.DefaultBufferSize` #90157
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.FileSystemWatcherTests_netstandard17.DroppedWatcher_Collectible #86564
    8.0.0
  • Bad codegen with Vector256/Vector512 #91325
  • Config generator overwrites existing properties when provided with empty config section #91380
  • Compiler error when using configuration binder source generator with custom collections #91324
  • Config generator doesn't match nullability semantics of built-in Bind #90987
    8.0.0
  • Update documentation for the Windows thread pool option #90444
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT is crashing on static interface method #90333
    8.0.0
  • native aot regression in .net 8.0 #91065
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2258306 #91485
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix usage of load library #91483
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Bump Microsoft.Private.Intellisense package version #91481
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move TargetsCurrent to net9 and add net8 workload #91480
    area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • Switch the `AppWithSubDirs` project used for single-file tests to project that is built outside of test runs #91477
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Condition EnableSingleFileAnalyzer #91474
    area-Meta
  • [maccatalyst] Make sure MacProxy is included in System.Net.Http #91473
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix `Item4` is missing in some `ValueTuple`s' `IStructuralEquatable.Equals` #91472
    area-System.Runtime, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix `Item4` is missing in some `ValueTuple`s' `IStructuralEquatable.Equals` #91471
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix `Item4` is missing in some `ValueTuple`s' `IStructuralEquatable.Equals` #91470
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • Enable interceptors implicitly in binder gen nupkg when generator is enabled #91469
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label
  • [browser] [wasm] remove special StringContent handling #91463
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement timezoneinfo functions #91458
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [WIP][mono] Basic SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector2 on arm64 #91455
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [PERF] Use the major version for the net_.0 version in create mono dotnet step #91452
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V] Implement ThisPtrRetBufPrecode::Init #91451
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Cleanup only changes #91445
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update CustomValidationAttribute ref to include missing properties #91441
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Check for generic structs in "needs marshalling" check #90836
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Make `--skip-unresolved` the default when not running from SDK #90512
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Bump mono to -std=gnu11 #91421
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Opportunistically use stack allocation for GC dynamic events #91001
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Share more code between ILLink/ILCompiler test infra #91358
    needs-area-label
  • Bump Microsoft.Private.Intellisense package version #91285
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [7.0] Fix session-local named mutex compat issue #90343
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 7.0.x
  • Add comment about support for null context in `hostfxr_get_runtime_delegate` #91479
    area-Host
  • [release/7.0-staging] [Mono] Fix offset calculation for nested struct, when pinvoke is enabled #91422
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] Fix perf pipeline #91446
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0] Fix LDTOKEN of methods that have modifiers #91439
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix runtime dispatch to static virtuals on interface types #91440
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix arm64/arm32 cross-DAC #91438
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [nodejs] Remove experimental wasm arguments from template #91401
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Options Source Gen Fixes #91432
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [Mono] Fix offset calculation for nested struct, when pinvoke is enabled #91417
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-mono, 8.0.0
  • Disable analyzers in workloads.csproj to fix the workloads build. #91476
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix `Item4` is missing in some `ValueTuple`s' `IStructuralEquatable.Equals` #91461
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix official builds for NativeAOT #91454
    area-Infrastructure, linkable-framework
  • JIT: Remove the minopts policy against cctors #90792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Remove some unused headers and functions #91177
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve DevContainer configuration for Codespaces #91465
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] [wasm] Request Streaming upload #91295
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [browser] make sure that no assets errors are lost #91320
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [ARM64] Add g_GCShadowEnd to JIT_WriteBarrier_Table #91342
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Microsoft.Bcl.Numerics.Tests: fix restore failure when DotNetBuildFromSource. #91402
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [FileSystemWatcher] Linux - Guarantee that we do not hold onto a strong reference of the watcher #91301
    area-System.IO
  • Fix runtime dispatch to static virtuals on interface types #91374
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix LDTOKEN of methods that have modifiers #91382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Add DebuggerTypeProxy to ListDictionaryInternal #91355
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Upgrade wasm helix VMs to ubuntu 22.04 #90881
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve perf of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #91290
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #91435
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [6.0] Fix session-local named mutex compat issue #90344
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.22
  • [release/8.0] Add Native AOT Pri0 test leg #91373
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Add late binding lookup in VB.NET for COM objects #91433
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, 8.0.0
  • Improve updating classes for generics #88277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Expand CreateSpan in T0 #91403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Adding a naive implementation of various primitive tensor operations #91228
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0-staging] [Mono] Fix offset calculation for nested struct, when pinvoke is enabled #91424
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-mono, 6.0.x
  • [mono] Reenable C4244 MSVC warning and fix occurrences #91395
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix NativeAOT unhandled exception stack trace #91415
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fix formatting of assertion failures and fail-fasts #91300
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add package readmes #91210
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Remove browser wasm from perf_slow #91429
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V, LoongArch64] Fix assert(!regArgMaskLive) in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs #91414
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [JIT] Fold some bitwise operations to vpternlog #91227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Prevent other threads from writing to a session once rundown begins #91383
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix x64 crossbuild on macOS arm64 #91413
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] ELT Profiler Bring-Up #91313
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][aot] Type load checks do not fail at compile time but produce a runtime exception #91261
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Switch to python generated source #91140
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • BigInteger constructor perf #91176
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use SequenceEqual in BigInteger.Equals #91416
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CopyLocalLockFileAssemblies changes the behavior of AutoGenerateBindingRedirects for good #35093

PullRequests

Created

  • add --no-http-cache option #35107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Side by side workload manifests and garbage collection for file based installs #35106
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35102
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #35100
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #35088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Fix CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName test by using CurrentCulture … #35084
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35068
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.309 #35073
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Fix CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName test by using CurrentCulture … #35083
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add DOTNET_LAUNCH_PROFILE environment when invoking dotnet run #35029
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Move to granular opt-in for interceptors preview #35024
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2258161 #34880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid loading all types when invoking Hot Reload handlers, handle type load failures #35077
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update branding to 7.0.112 #35072
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • (Linux only?) Method group intrinsic type ignores params and default arguments #69797
  • Interpolated string handler API support #69796

Closed

  • Add a C# code defragmenter? #67412
    Backlog
  • Feature 'Asset synchronization' is currently unavailable due to an internal error. #68246
  • Migrate Xamarin IVTs to the External Access pattern #35099
  • Using primary constructors reports erroneous NRT warnings in some cases. #68616
    18.0
  • Severity configuration is confusing #69176
    17.8 P4
  • Primary ctor parameter writes should be assumed necessary even if not read later in the method #68904
    17.8 P2

PullRequests

Created

  • Properly parse members in type declarations missing an identifier #69798
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Make completion handler more resilient #69795
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Update configs after 17.8p2 snap #69799
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove EditorFeatures.Cocoa and VSMac IVTs #69765
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Pack our language server in a separate package for each platform #69786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Switch PatternMatcher to use a TemporaryArray instead of ArrayBuilder. #69784
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update the severity combo boxes in EditorConfig UX to reflect the correct semantics #69778
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Feature - Editor Config UI, Next

Updated

  • Remove well known implicit conversion method #69787
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Trim ToString calls when converting to interpolated strings when there are interpolated string handlers available. #69723
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run design time builds out-of-process #69616
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add analysis and emit difference time spans to EnC telemetry #69794
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Dispose per-instance services created by factories #47951
    Area-IDE
  • Slightly fewer allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #69791
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Bump decompiler for debugger #69772
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce array allocations in `PENamedTypeSymbol.TypeParameters` and `PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers` #68978
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Update TFM in tests to net8.0 #69669
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Lazily build a case-insensitive comparison for performance #69756
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add support for reading runsettings passed by the client #69792
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #50480
  • Building ASP.NET Core from source fails with an error (MissingMethodException System.Text.Json.JsonDocument System.Text.Json.JsonDocument.Parse) #50479
  • NavigationException raised when using NavigationManager.NavigateTo upon form post in SSR #50478
  • Can't find the {project}.styles.css file, when using the Blazor Web App template create a .Net 8.0 (preview) application. #50473
  • Faild to load {Assembly}.styles.css with a specific route in .net 8 Blazor Web App #50471
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, json #50470
  • Welcoming a new member to our Community Triagers group #50469
    Discussions

Closed

  • Provide a solution for sharing authentication state of a user in a Blazor application with client #49626
    8.0-rc1
  • Perf improvement: json #50434
  • Dynamically-added SSR content breaks if it includes script tags #50424
    8.0-rc2
  • HttpLogger does not log RequestBody #49063
    8.0-rc2
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware does not log RequestBody when body is consumed by copying to another stream #49989
    8.0-rc2
  • HttpLogging redaction and enrichment #31844
    8.0-rc2
  • Blazor localization (translation) does not work with multiple languages #50361
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features for .NET 6 still in a preview mode #50472

PullRequests

Created

  • [Do not review] Break LoadFromStoreCert to detect test failures #50485
    area-networking
  • [release/6.0] Update jquery-validation to v1.19.5 #50484
    area-mvc, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Update jquery-validation to v1.19.5 #50483
    area-ui-rendering, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Update jquery-validation to v1.19.5 #50482
    area-ui-rendering
  • Add SetBrowserRequestStreamingEnabled extension method #50481
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `460ae98` to `8a6feab` #50476
    area-infrastructure
  • Update CertificateLoader.cs #50474
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Document the coupling between KestrelServerLimits and *TransportOptions #50468
    area-networking

Merged

  • Update jquery-validation to v1.19.5 #50467
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview1
  • Merge property attributes with parameter attributes for AsParameters #50458
    area-minimal, 8.0-rc2
  • Suppress nullability warning when resolving JSON body or service #50410
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix exception handling for complex form mapping in minimal APIs #50444
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix corrupted streaming SSR output #50380
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix local build file modification #50387
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix scripts in SSR updates #50453
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix pRequestInfo INVALID_POINTER_READ caused by GCs (v7 backport) #50448
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, community-contribution, area-networking, 7.0.12
  • Fix pRequestInfo INVALID_POINTER_READ caused by GCs (v6 backport) #50447
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, community-contribution, area-networking, 6.0.23
  • Fix outputcache bug when using IOutputCacheBufferStore #50455
    area-infrastructure, area-networking, 8.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6f6ab42` to `8a6feab` #50477
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.12
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6f6ab42` to `8a6feab` #50475
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.23
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Ignore properties without public setters during form mapping #50318
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-rc2
  • Make MapIdentityApi DTOs public #50247
    area-identity, 8.0-rc2

Updated

  • [Blazor] APIs to preserve content between enhanced navigations #50437
    area-blazor
  • [SignalR] Error if multiple service attributes are on a single parameter #50248
    area-signalr, 8.0-rc2
  • Persist Prerendered State #50373
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Form mapping support for select multiple, logging, DataMember and other improvements/cleanups #50431
    area-blazor
  • Tidy up aka.ms links in data protection error messages #50465
    area-dataprotection
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50422
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2258018 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Split redis output-cache pieces from Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchange.Redis into Microsoft.AspNetCore.OutputCaching.StackExchangeRedis #50457
    area-middleware
  • Modernize Redis distributed cache #45735
    area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Button and ImageButton command doesn't work on ContentPage shown using PushModalAsync #17176
  • Setting the `Style` property using the `VisualStateManager` within a Style resource does not work #17175
  • Bindings break after one throws an exception #17171
  • PlatformView cannot be null #17165
  • Collectionview scroll position resets in Shell Tabbar page when changing tabs on Android #17162

Closed

  • The SVG image cannot be fully displayed #15442
    Backlog
  • Running app crashes immediately #9714
    Backlog
  • Partial methods with return values and platform implementations won't compile #9860
    Backlog
  • Page.BackgroundImageSource causes artifacts while scrolling #9992
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [net8.0] [release/8.0.1xx-rc1]Revert net7 sr8 #17174
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1]Revert net7 sr8 #17173
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Updated the RoundRectangle BorderTest to check all 4 corners #17172
    area/testing
  • [net7.0] Update AndroidX #17168
    area/platform, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Add ViewHandler & IViewHandler docs #17167
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Improve VisualElement API Docs Follow-up #17166
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Ensure that the navigation page renderer measures its current Page #17164
    area/navigation 🧭, .NET 8 GA

Merged

  • Update NuGet.config for 7.0.11 #17170
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Merge net8.0 to rc1 #17169
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 branch #17139
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Update BindableObject API docs #17138
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Update VisualElement docs (#16754) #17094
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • PermissionStatus: Remove "ios only" from documentation of Restricted #17156
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17161
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add a second set of borders to the Border Resize Content sample #17158
  • [tests] Ignore appium visual test #15330 while we investigate #17143
    area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • Drag and Drop move suppression for older android builds #17150
    platform/android 🤖, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    .NET 8 GA
  • (Windows) ImageButton contents now explicitly stretches #17159
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-button, Under Consideration
  • Update Page API docs #16981
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix CollectionView not displaying header or footers #16870
    area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • Add .NET 7 to the NuGet packages #17048
    Under Consideration
